name: test_minting_two_tokens[plutus_v1]
description:
Test minting two tokens with a single Plutus script.

        * fund the token issuer and create a UTxO for collateral
        * check that the expected amount was transferred to token issuer's address
        * mint the tokens using a Plutus script
        * check that the tokens were minted and collateral UTxO was not spent
        * (optional) check transactions in db-sync
descriptionHtml:
Test minting two tokens with a single Plutus script.

    * fund the token issuer and create a UTxO for collateral
    * check that the expected amount was transferred to token issuer's address
    * mint the tokens using a Plutus script
    * check that the tokens were minted and collateral UTxO was not spent
    * (optional) check transactions in db-sync

labels.name: tag
labels.value: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras')

tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Plutus is available only in Alonzo+ eras')
